name: @n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.rerankerCohere
description: Use Cohere Reranker to reorder documents after retrieval from a vector store by relevance to the given query.

properties.name: modelName
properties.description: The model that should be used to rerank the documents. Learn more.

properties.name: topN
properties.description: The maximum number of documents to return after reranking
